text: I'm Akshay GART I'm the CEO and
co-founder of in Excel I Drive strategy
product and growth of the company then
Excel is a financial technology company
that leverages deep data analytics in
order to automate credit scoring and the
provision of credit to underbanked
Millennials we focus primarily on
Indonesia which is a country with a
population of nearly 250 million people
and a trillion dollar economy where the
vast majority of the middle class is
under banked our goal is to enable a
faster and simpler provision of credit
for this middle class our flagship
product / devo works as a digital credit
card it combines the simplicity of a two
click checkout with the availability of
instant credit in layman's terms what it
means for you as a user is that it will
take you less than 2 minutes to apply
and get approved for a critical loan and
after approval you can go transact on
any partner ecommerce site in seconds
and get the full flexibility of paying
back in full in 30 days at no cost or
over three six twelve months by
installment at interest rates that are
very similar to that of a bank in the
era of the cloud for us the choice was
frankly pretty easy AWS is the
unparalleled leader in the space it
provides a very sophisticated
combination of flexibility high
performance reliability cost efficiency
our entire stack all the way from the
time that a user actually downloads our
app and installs it to the time users
paying back at the end of the
transaction funnel the entire stack is
run on AWS 25 to 30 thousand
transactions per day growing at the rate
of 20% month on month we're processing
20 to 30 gigabytes of raw unstructured
data per day for the purposes of credit
scoring application approval and
collections across a very wide variety
of functions and purposes the ones that
I'd like to highlight are EWS lambda and
Amazon kinases we use a combination of
the two to process all of our raw data
for the purposes of credit scoring and
transaction settlement in addition to
those we use a very wide variety of
other services as well such as Amazon
53:4 domain management DWS elastic
Beanstalk machine learning algorithms
frankly the list is very large the
biggest benefits of using AWS are really
the combination of flexibility very high
reliability and very high performance we
can now really focus on taking our
product to market and deploying it
quickly as opposed to having to manage
server deployments and maintain those
server farms which is historically what
companies have had to do this is a very
complex task to manage and we've been
able to do that consistently by using a
very wide variety very tightly coupled
AWS services by using AWS we haven't had
to worry so much about reliability of
poor performance knowing that some of
the world's biggest companies are
relying on AWS and the companies
investing a lot in R&D and scalability
also gives us peace of mind about the
fact that we are not going to go down
AWS is there as a very reliable player
we've been able to create a world-class
customer experience in Indonesia by
bundling our product very tightly away
the AWS from a customer's perspective
the application process the transaction
process the repayment process is
extremely simple as' is entirely digital
and most importantly is incredibly quick
each one of these literally takes
seconds for a customer we have
considered other solutions and AWS is in
our opinion quite different
I think AWS combines a very wide variety
of services that are required by a
company such as us that's one secondly
it came to us at a very cost-effective
price point thirdly I think having very
strong account management in place and
technical support in place locally
whether it's in Jakarta or in the
neighborhood in Singapore is really what
sealed a deal for us it's really a
combination of those three factors we
intend to keep on growing with EWS we
don't see a reason not to our goal is
over the next few years to become
established as a mainstream credit
provide
in the same way that the banks are we
would like and hope that over the next
few years as we achieve those business
goals were actually able to do that
together with AWS
